title: Encouraging Voice-over Pack for Puzzle Games
description: Show your players that you care whether they succeed at your puzzles!
longDescription:
A kind, energetic voice can guide your players through the tutorial and beyond with this pack of 32 phrases performed by professional vocal performer CB Droege.


Sample track: https://soundcloud.com/user-849876158/encouraging-puzzle-vo-pack-sample-track


Welcome!

Yes!

Nope.

No.

Alright

Let's learn something new!

Here we go!

Great job!

You win!

Game over!

Congratulations! 

Success!

Very good!

How fortunate!

Hmm. 

This one looks tough.

Oh no!

Uh oh!

Trouble ahead!

You've unlocked a new area!

You'll get it next time!

You've got this!

Would you like help?

Here, let me show you.

I know you can do it!

Give it one more try!

Yay!

Here's something you haven't seen before!

This is new.

Try this one!

Let's look at the map!

Where to next?

Oh my!

Thank you!

Time is running out!

Hurry!

Hmm… Seems like you don't have enough.

Victory!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  39 Phrases, most with multiple takes
  • 73 separate game-ready WAV files
  •  An encouraging, kind voice for your light-themed puzzle game (or a creepily kind voice for your dark-themed puzzle game)

Number of Audio Waves: 73

Number of Audio Cues: 73

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: no

Minutes of audio provided: 2

Supported Development Platforms: all

Supported Target Build Platforms: all

Documentation: n/a

Important/Additional Notes:
